The entry point to be used is  org.nuxeo.ecm.client.impl.DefaultContentManager

The following snipset gives you an example of how connecting to the newswave content
manager using the Atom Publication protocol.

 contentManager = new DefaultContentManager();
 contentManager.init(new URL("http://localhost:8080/cmis", AtomPubConnector.class);

The next step is to get a reference to the query entries

 Repository defaultRepository = managerUnderTest.getDefaultRepository();
 List<QueryEntry> queries = defaultRepository.getQueries();

Each queries is a document feed descriptor available in the newswave server
(see Eclipse:nuxeo-newswave-cws/doc/FeedService.wiki)

Then, from each query entries you can fetch a document feed

 DocumentFeed feed = queries.get(index).getFeed();

Synchronizing the feed with the server side can be done as follow

 DocumentFeed synchedFeed = feed.refresh();
